GSD.description:
btrfs: fix lockdep splat with reloc root extent buffers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.7 by commit b83e1567af28055b9a0bb7b10fcdd58b02d00954. For more details please see the references link.
